title: 85503 Secure View™ DC Battery Backup Belt Drive Wi-Fi® Garage Door Opener
description: Integrated video camera enables you to see what is happening in your garage through a live feed or recorded event. Video camera begins recording when motion is detected. Battery Backup allows you to open/close your door even when the power is out. Built-in Wi-Fi® allows for smartphone control with the myQ® App.
